html: It’s important to remember that this shouldn’t be a partisan issue: aiding the rapid starvation of 6 million Yemenis stands as the antithesis to our country’s stance as a democratic nation. Let’s pass my legislation for a historic win in the name of democracy and decency
text:
It’s important to remember that this shouldn’t be a partisan issue: aiding the rapid starvation of 6 million Yemenis stands as the antithesis to our country’s stance as a democratic nation. 

Let’s pass my legislation for a historic win in the name of democracy and decency

html: Also, compassion fatigue is a real consequence of having seen videos and images of suffering in Yemen for the past several years. However, it’s not an excuse to stop caring, and it’s certainly not an excuse to stop fighting for an end to the conflict.
text:
Also, compassion fatigue is a real consequence of having seen videos and images of suffering in Yemen for the past several years. 

However, it’s not an excuse to stop caring, and it’s certainly not an excuse to stop fighting for an end to the conflict.

text:
I just had a furloughed worker come visit me in my office.

“I work for HUD,” he said. “My family is hurting now that I’m three weeks without a paycheck,”

“but please - please don’t give into a wall. I don’t want the political tool of withholding my paycheck to be legitimized.”
